name: algosphere
title: AlgoSphere
description: AlgoSphere is a social media and learning platform for developers, offering interactive coding challenges, online code compilers, and the ability to save and share code.

name: iplay
title: iplay
description: iPlay is my clone version of the mobile application "WePlay". It uses Firebase Authentication and Firestore for user data handling.

name: catland
title: Catland
description: Cat Land is a project that displays informations about different cat breeds. This was my first React project that uses React Router and API calls.

name: calculator
title: Calculator
description: A basic Programmer's Calculator with basic calculation and convertion functionalities.
